title: Fix Presale 'ICP Remaining' display to show 515000 ICP correctly

requirements.summary: Correct the Presale Progress 'ICP Remaining' stat to display an unformatted integer (no separators/decimals) and compute remaining as max(515000 - received, 0).
acceptanceCriteria: When the presale has 0 ICP received, the 'ICP Remaining' stat shows exactly "515000 ICP" (no thousands separators, no decimals).
When contributions are detected, the 'ICP Remaining' stat updates to (515000 - received) ICP and never goes below 0.
No other Presale Status section labels/content are changed.

file_operations.description: Update the 'ICP Remaining' calculation and formatting: derive remaining from the existing PRESALE_CAP_ICP constant minus received (prefer BigInt/e8s-safe math, then convert to an integer ICP value), clamp at 0, and render it as a plain string without toLocaleString or decimals so 0 received shows exactly "515000 ICP". Keep all other labels and content unchanged.
